home.main_heading: Welcome to the free PV provider check!
home.main_desc: We will help you find the best photovoltaic offer for your needs - completely free of charge and without obligation! With our special tool, customers and the right providers can get in touch directly.
home.welcome: Do you want to launch your project?
home.description: The development of reliable and scalable software solutions for any operating system, browser and device. We bring together deep industry expertise and the latest IT advancements to deliver customized solutions and products that perfectly match the needs and behavior of their users.

about.title: A strong team
about.description: Founded in 2000, our company is a provider of IT consulting and software development services. Starting as a small AI product company, we transitioned into IT services and since then have helped non-IT organizations and software product companies improve their business performance and quickly win new customers.

rethinkenergy.subheading: We compare all available providers and find the best solution for you!
rethinkenergy.para: Become independent with your own photovoltaic system and design one sustainable and clean future.

advantages.para: Another tip: The electricity provider TIBBER offers dynamic electricity tariffs and is therefore ideal for PV operators with electricity storage. More information at: https://tibber.com/de

inquery.heading: Do you have questions?
inquery.para: We would be happy to answer any questions you may have about the topic of “photovoltaics” free of charge and without obligation.Simply fill out the contact form and we willget in touch immediately!

footer.para1: Renevatec is a Berlin-based company committed to making solar energy accessible and effective for everyone. We combine innovative technology with deep industry knowledge to connect customers with the best solar energy solutions available. Our vision is a world in which renewable energy is the standard and is effortlessly integrated into everyday life.

Thank you very much for your inquiry and your trust! We look forward to finding the right provider for you and willget back to you as soon as possible!

about_us_page.heading: About us!
about_us_page.para: At renevatec, we are committed to helping both private households and companies find the ideal photovoltaic solution. Through our free and non-binding solar check, we identify tailor-made offers that perfectly suit your needs. We are your experts for photovoltaic solutions! Would you like to find out more? Arrange a consultation appointment with us now or use our free PV check.

service_page.heading: Renevatec- Our Approach!
service_page.para: Our goal is to not only present you with offers, but to offer tailor-made solutions that are precisely tailored to your individual requirements.
service_page.list:
• - Data Protection: Your data will be treated confidentially and will not be passed on to third parties indiscriminately.
  • - Experience: Benefit from our many years of extensive industry knowledge.
  • - Personal Service: Our experts are available to answer all your questions and work with you to develop the best possible solution.
  • - Independence: Achieve independence from rising electricity prices and secure an independent energy supply.
  • - Increased Value: Investing in photovoltaics not only increases your independence. We guarantee that every PV system with storage will pay for itself as the only building technology system.
service_page.experties:
OUR EXPERTISE

We know that every project is unique, which is why we offer personalized advice by our experienced experts. Feel free to contact us!
